channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-7425] Move to the newest BootStrap css and js for the webui.
item.summary: Move to the newest BootStrap css and js for the webui.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
• Updated to the latest Bootstrap css
  • Updated to the latest Bootstrap js
  • Updated to the latest jquery js.
  • Added more whitespace.
  • Changed the tabs to nav pills.
  • Made the tab switching code more future proof.
  • Change the title to use an image of the HBase logo.
  • Made the user tables page link to the table detail page.

+1

E showed me what it looks like. Its phurty.

Integrated in HBase-TRUNK #3648 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-TRUNK/3648/)
HBASE-7425 Move to the newest BootStrap css and js for the webui. (Revision 1425196)

Result = FAILURE
